//: Changes to this file will be overwritten
Modify it in the app-template directory
name: dash
author: Dash
title: Dash Copay

scripts.start:ios: npm run build:www && npm run build:ios && npm run open:ios
scripts.start:android: npm run build:www && npm run build:android && npm run run:android
scripts.start:windows: npm run build:www && npm run build:windows
scripts.pre-build: cd app-template && node apply.js dash && cd ..
scripts.build:ios: cordova prepare ios && cordova build ios --debug
scripts.pre-build:android: npm run pre-build-release && npm run clean:builds-android
scripts.build:android: cordova prepare android && cordova build android --debug
scripts.build:windows: cordova prepare windows && cordova build windows -- --arch="ARM"
scripts.build:ios-release: cordova prepare ios && cordova build ios --release
scripts.build:android-release: cordova prepare android && cordova build android --release
scripts.build:windows-release: cordova prepare windows && cordova build windows --release --arch="ARM"
scripts.final:ios: npm run final:www && npm run build:ios-release && npm run open:ios
scripts.final:android: npm run final:www && npm run clean:builds-android && npm run build:android-release && npm run sign:android
scripts.final:windows: npm run final:www && npm run build:windows-release
scripts.final:desktop: npm run build:desktop && npm run build:osx
scripts.sign:android: rm -f platforms/android/build/outputs/apk/release/android-release-signed-aligned.apk; jarsigner -verbose -sigalg SHA1withRSA -digestalg SHA1 -keystore ../copay.keystore -signedjar platforms/android/build/outputs/apk/release/android-release-signed.apk  platforms/android/build/outputs/apk/release/android-release-unsigned.apk copay_play && $ANDROID_HOME/build-tools/26.0.1/zipalign -v 4 platforms/android/build/outputs/apk/release/android-release-signed.apk platforms/android/build/outputs/apk/release/android-release-signed-aligned.apk && open platforms/android/build/outputs/apk/release
scripts.apply:copay: npm i fs-extra && cd app-template && node apply.js copay && npm i && cordova prepare
scripts.apply:dash: npm i fs-extra && cd app-template && node apply.js dash && npm i && cordova prepare
scripts.apply:bitpay: npm i fs-extra && cd app-template && node apply.js bitpay && npm i && cordova prepare
scripts.clean: trash platforms && trash plugins && cordova prepare
